name: GoCodes Asset Management
overview:
Welcome to the GoCodes asset management and tracking system—the solution that provides the power of an enterprise asset management system at a fraction of the cost. When it comes to asset management, the owners of small- to medium-sized businesses face a big problem. Most asset tracking systems require expensive proprietary software and hardware, intensive IT training, and complicated labeling systems.

The GoCodes asset management solution makes it easy. Durable asset tags, scannable by any smartphone, prevent loss and theft, while a unique, easy-to-learn smartphone/cloud-based asset management system helps you keep track of the value, serial numbers, warranty, and service records of every piece of equipment you own.

GoCodes captures the power of QR Codes, which can be scanned and linked by virtually any smartphone. By tagging your assets with the GoCode system, you can connect each item to an easy-to-use and customizable web-based management system, which can be accessed via smartphone, tablet, or computer.

With GoCodes asset tags there’s no software to purchase, no scanners to program, no IT support required—and tamper-proof labels are included. You can literally set up a sophisticated asset management and tracking system in an afternoon.
